titleStmt.title: A select second husband for Sir Thomas Ouerburie's wife, now a matchlesse widow
titleStmt.author: Davies, John, 1565?-1618.
Overbury, Thomas, Sir, 1581-1613. Wife, now a widowe.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Creede and Barnard Allsopp, for Iohn Marriott: and are to be sold at his shop at the white Flower-de-luce, neere Fetter Lane end in Fleetstreete,

notesStmt.note: An imitation of: Overbury, Sir Thomas. A wife, now a widowe.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the white Flower-de-luce, neere Fetter Lane end in Fleetstreete
